name: Show of the Dead
description: You are an immortal being, trapped in a cruel television show, which forces you to die again and again, to appeal to the audience. In this 2d puzzle game, you play using the WASD keys for the qwerty, ZQSD for the azerty, you can interact with item using E and jump using SPACE, if you are stuck, try grabbing the defibrillator and using it around.
